name: Hoarders' Church
description:
Created for a class with the aim to "create a small, single scene ‘diorama’ in Unity ... there should also be at least one interaction (and hopefully more) in your scene."

Elvanfoot Parish (better known as Hoarders' church) is a church in South Lanarkshire that is known for it's esoteric collection of hoarded items. 

For this assignment I recreated this church with the idea of it being a game developers church of hoarded assets.  I wanted the project to have something to progress through, as well as an ending, so I added a limerick puzzle to each area of the church that the player has to complete.

Each asset is cited  in game, including the music.
